description: Bump the Maven plugin version and create a migration for users.

newVersion.description: The version to which to bump maven to. New Maven plugin version (e.g., '0.0.10')

nxVersion.description: Nx version for the migration (e.g., '22.1.0-beta.7'). To find a good value for this, use 'npm view nx@next' and choose the next prerelease version which will follow that. For example, if the next version of `nx` is 22.1.0-beta.2, then use 22.1.0-beta.3
